data.name: Euro Truck Simulator 2 - Belgian Paint Jobs Pack
data.detailed_description:
Customize your truck with your country flag! A choice of five unique paint jobs will come handy if you feel you need to show your affiliation...

  • Flemish Lion
  • Walloon Rooster
  • City of Brussels
  • Belgium Flag Metallic
  • Belgium Flag Decal

All of these themes are applicable to any in-game truck except for 8x4 chassis configurations.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
  • Hard Drive: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (2 GB)
  • Hard Drive: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 (Mavericks)
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
  • Hard Drive: 3 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10 (Yosemite)
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (Intel HD 5300)
  • Hard Drive: 3 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
  • Hard Drive: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably)
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (2 GB)
  • Hard Drive: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably)
